review_data.title: North Indian Cuisine
review_data.content: The location is good,walking distance from the main train station. The decor is ok,typical to any Indian restaurant in Europe.The staff efficient and orders were turned around quickly, despite it being a evening dinner time. The food was above average,so worth a visit.

review_data.title: Home food in Far Europe

review_data.title: Not authentic food, only the naan was alright
review_data.content: The Dal makhni was not at all authentic, using another dal for this recipe. The gravy for the chicken and the paneer dishes all tasted the same. Would not recommend visiting. Dialed down to cater to Swiss taste. Not the real deal!

review_data.title: Very Good Good!

review_data.title: Delicious Indian food

review_data.title: Faisal
review_data.content: Brilliant food and service. Very friendly staff... Would recommend to everyone for must visit.... We had vegetable, Lentil, prawn curry... Garlic nan was too good..

review_data.title: Best indian in Zurich

review_data.title: Always relieved to experience a decent Indian Restaurant

review_data.title: Great North Indian food
review_data.content: Very friendly and quick service... Taste great and spicy!! We were served by akshay.. Really nice guy.. Take tram 14 from de station

review_data.title: The worst indian i have ever eaten

review_data.title: Relaxing experience with good food
review_data.content: We visited the restaurant a bit later on the evening when the place was maybe half full. We got really nice service, good recommendations and the food was very tasty. I especially liked the garlic nan!

review_data.title: good food and place

review_data.title: Good indian food!
review_data.content: An easy to find restaurant in the middle of town. The restaurant itself was comfortable, with good service. The food was excellent! Anything we asked for was delivered without any hesitation. My husband is a very fussy eater and he thought the food was fantastic....More

review_data.title: Authentic Indian food in Zurich
review_data.content: Masala was a nice experience. Tea, Samosa and Pakodas to start with helped a weeks cravings. The food was good and the Indian breads didnt drip of butter. The service was good, and the prices were just about right. its location, near HBF and the...More

review_data.title: One of the best Indian restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: nice restaurant - the bar section is the best. Food and service fantastic... attentive and authentic Not overly priced Would recommend this restaurant

review_data.title: Excellent food, excellent service
review_data.content: we were served by a waiter who knew the menu and dishes very well. He offered recommendations. He was discrete and attentive. The Food was delicious. Can't wait to return again!

review_data.title: Good Indian Food

review_data.title: Good Indian Food

review_data.title: MASALA - A Legit Choice!

review_data.title: Excellent Indian Food
review_data.content: We had real good dinner at Masala last evening. In addition to the food, the ambiance and the hospitality was impressive.

review_data.title: One of the best currys in Switzerland

review_data.title: Decent Indian restaurant near Stauffacher
review_data.content: Food was good, lunch prices are what you would expect for Switzerland. Lunch selection good, service was ok. Haven't been here for dinner.

review_data.title: Amazing Food and Great Sernvice

review_data.title: Friendly service but disappointing Indian food

review_data.title: Ok food but excellent service and ambience
review_data.content: Was there with my hubby on his birthday last week... Was dissapointed with the vindaloo but the service made it up... The guy serving us went out of his way to make it special for us.... Had a great night overall will be back ......More

review_data.title: Decent Indian Food - excellent service
review_data.content: This restaurant serves decent Indian food and the service is much better than elsewhere in Zurich. There were several Indian guests when we ate there, which is always a good sign for Indian restaurants abroad.

review_data.title: Nice but too expensive
review_data.content: Good location and food, very friendly service but 34CHF for a lamb curry is too expensive even for Zurich.

review_data.title: Very pleased. Go here for Indian food in Zürich

review_data.title: Best in Zürich
review_data.content: I have been going here for years. My favourite dish is Chicken Khadhi, medium spicy. They do a decent Naan and Roti plus the Sheek Kebabs are great. Not cheap but then not much is in Zürich. Lamb in spinach also worth a mention.

review_data.title: best indian restaurant in town!
